sense.name: (cause to) spray or wet with a spurt of liquid
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent] SQUIRT NP2 (at NP3) NP1[agent] SQUIRT NP2 (with NP3)
sense.examples: Tom Cruise was upset after pranksters squirted him with water. She squirted the stained wall again with the cleaner and got a scrubby sponge. He was scared when one of those dinosaurs squirted water at him.
